mention.text: 19 nov 89 -- this is our responsibility , this is our mission , and we are willing to give our lives in sacrifice , as has been proven by the many heroic soldiers who are dying in this struggle to defend justice , peace , democracy
our faith in god and our christian principles
this attempt to destroy the institutionality of el salvador

a timely occasion , salvadoran people , to say that the armed forces as an institution at society 's service deeply regret and have been dismayed by the incidents at the jose simeon canas central american university
the armed forces as an institution at society 's service deeply regret and have been dismayed by the incidents at the jose simeon
the salvadoran people and the international community
the salvadoran people who have already suffered so much
the terrorist forces that are still trying to hurt our civilian population

a timely opportunity to point to the terrorist forces that are still trying to hurt our civilian population , to tell them that their cause , the cause of violence , irrationality , and disrespect for the people 's will , is lost
the cause of violence , irrationality , and disrespect for the people 's will
violence , irrationality , and disrespect for the people 's will
